title: Growing savings from the ground up, locally
teaser: We're not too good at saving these days. Americans have a savings rate of about 3 percent. How can local governments work to grow that number?
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday, July 24, 2013
contentencoded:
We're not too good at saving these days. Americans have a savings rate of about 3 percent. How can local governments work to grow that number?

Marketplace's Adriene Hill joins Morning Report host David Brancaccio to discuss. Find out more about savings (tricks, tips, and resources) from our Marketplace Money team here.
